description: Two men, aged 33 and 49, will appear in court on 28 July charged with Stephen Ridgeway's murder.
title: Keynsham murder trial set after death of burgled man, 72
title_page: Keynsham murder trial set after death of burgled man, 72 - BBC News
maintext:
A murder trial date has been set for two men after a 72-year-old man died following an attack during a burglary.
Ryan Robbins, 33, and Wayne Milsom, 49, will appear at Bristol Crown Court on 28 July.
They have been charged with the murder of Stephen Ridgeway, who died on 7 December after he suffered injuries in the attack at his house on Tenby Road, Keynsham, five weeks earlier.
Mr Milsom, of Keynsham, pleaded not guilty at Bristol Crown Court on 28 February. Mr Robbins, also from Keynsham, did not attend but a new date is being set for him to enter pleas.
